## MathRadical.HideDegree 属性

当隐藏度数为真时，度数不会显示，如 √𝑥

```csharp
public bool HideDegree { get; set; }
```

### 示例

示例:

```csharp
[C#]
MathRadical radical = new MathRadical(new MathematicalText("x"), new MathematicalText("3"));
radical.HideDegree = true;
```
